name: Almighty Shield | Pre-Alpha-Build Available Now!
description:
A few years have passed since the War with the Giants over the so-called "Almighty Shield", a Shield so powerful it split a nation in half, has ended. You, "Shield", will discover post-War Mathira and its many Secrets . But beware along your way you will meet powerful enemies and gain Epic Loot to become Stronger and eventually Obtain the "Almighty Shield"! What you might Encounter on your Way too are "Soul-Knights" with them its the question of what you are gonna do with them:

Demolish or Free Them?

Controls:

Walking Around - W, A, S ,D.

Heal - F.

Interact - Space.

Left Mouse Button - Attack, Dash.

Right Mouse Button - Pick up items.

TAB - Inventory

 (While in Inventory) LMB - Drag items around or Navigate the Inventory Tabs.

 (While in Inventory) Shift+LMB - Put item in the correct Slot.

DISCLAIMER: This is a Prototype and Heavily Unfinished and will differ from the v1.0 Release eventually.

I'll be happy to answer any Questions or Accept any Suggestions.

Patch Notes for new Releases will be posted if there are any.
